nodes.text: Bloatbarges were floating craft used by the Galactic Empire on Milvayne to remove the foul air from the upper levels of Milvayne City and dump it into its underworld. The criminals Chelli Aphra and 0-0-0 hitchhiked on one with Vulaada Klam and the qaberworm Gurtyl until the Milvayne Authority intercepted them.
